name: import
title: Pathling Import Operation
description: This operation allows bulk data to be imported into the server from NDJSON, Parquet, or Delta format files, making the data available for query.

parameter.name: source
parameter.documentation: A source file containing FHIR resources to be included within this import operation. Each file must contain only one type of resource. Supported formats are NDJSON, Parquet, and Delta.

part.name: resourceType
part.documentation: The base FHIR resource type contained within this source file.

part.name: url
part.documentation: A URL that can be used to retrieve this source file.

part.name: mode
part.documentation: Controls how data is merged with existing resources. Possible values are 'error' (fail if resources exist; default), 'overwrite' (delete and replace all existing resources), 'append' (add new resources without modifying existing), 'ignore' (skip if resources exist), and 'merge' (match by ID and update or add as appropriate).

part.name: format
part.documentation: Indicates the format of the source file. Possible values are 'ndjson' (default), 'parquet', and 'delta'.
